headers.access-control-expose-headers: ETag, Link, Location, Retry-After, X-GitHub-OTP, X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Used, X-RateLimit-Resource, X-RateLimit-Reset, X-OAuth-Scopes, X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes, X-Poll-Interval, X-GitHub-Media-Type, X-GitHub-SSO, X-GitHub-Request-Id, Deprecation, Sunset

issueOrPullRequest.body: This pull request improves when to load OPENAI_AGENTS_DISABLE_TRACING env variable. It used to be loaded when the DefaultTraceProvider class is imported, but now it loads the env variable when staring the trace provider for the first time at runtime.
issueOrPullRequest.title: Improve the loading of OPENAI_AGENTS_DISABLE_TRACING
